MMC.title: Map My Customers
description: Worked full-time remotely on the product team to analyze the data collected on the web app and the mobile app
Compiled metrics from the PostgresSQL database and developed PCA and SVM statistical models to predict if users will buy a subscription based on their usage during free trial period
Analyzed geopoints recorded by the mobile app to develop a model that predicts a user’s home/office locations and connected the model to OpenStreetMaps API to obtain their addresses

PrincetonCOS226.title: Princeton University Computer Science Department
PrincetonCOS226.position: COS 226: Algorithms and Data Structures Grader
description: Grades the coding assignments for the class COS 226: Algorithms and Data Structures

Analyze students’ codes for their efficiency, style, and clarity, and provide feedback by teaching them good coding practices and more efficient implementations of algorithms and data structures like Binary Search and Deque

Princeton.title: Princeton University
description: Intended certificates in Robotics and Intelligent System and Statistics and Machine Learning
Coursework: Algorithms and Data Structures, Introduction to Programming Systems, Operating Systems, Functional Programming, Computer Vision
Awards: 2nd Place at Citadel Terminal Live Princeton vs. Penn

HappyHarvest.title: Happy Harvest
description: Worked full-time in a team of 6 to develop educational software using python to implement Natural Language Processing (e.g. Stanford CoreNLP, spacy, and NLTK) and Bayesian Knowledge Tracing
Organize test materials, teaching books,  and other documents using Word, Excel, and PowerPoint
Software launched in over 100 schools across China in the 2019-2020 school year
